location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 311.5 x 418.5mm, on sheet 370 x 476mm

mods.abstract: The map shows Syria (and parts of its neighbouring countries), and indicates international frontiers, double track railways, single track railways, all weather roads, dry weather roads, pipelines, and hydrology.The map was created by the Research Department of the Foreign Office, and forms Annex C of the Middle East (Official) Committee Working Party paper 'Syria' by the Foreign Office dated 25 May 1949 (M.E.(O) W.P.3 (Revise)) [folios 19 to 41 of IOR/L/PS/12/4759].
